title: Una Filma di
brief_description: Designed to promote the Australian Universities Drama Festival. Shows the diverse reactions to an advertising poster ranging from hysteria and swooning to police action. Includes an early appearance by Max Gillies. Written by John Dawson. Music by George Tibbits.
